metadata.title: CVE-2014-5332 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description: Race condition in NVMap in NVIDIA Tegra Linux Kernel 3.10 allows localusers to gain privileges via a crafted NVMAP_IOC_CREATE IOCTL call, whichtriggers a use-after-free error, as demonstrated by using a race conditionto escape the Chrome sandbox.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
